# Ventriloquism (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Figment Spells|figment]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, F (parchment rolled into cone)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** Intelligible sound, usually speech

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will disbelief (if interacted with)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 365

You can make your voice (or any sound that you can normally make vocally) seem to issue from someplace else. You can speak in any language you know. With respect to such voices and sounds, anyone who hears the sound and rolls a successful save recognizes it as illusory (but still hears it).
